title: Police: 5 shot in downtown Tacoma
content:
TACOMA, Wash. - Tacoma Police are investigating after five people were shot in downtown Tacoma early Saturday morning.
Police reported hearing gunshots just before 2 a.m. on Pacific Avenue between 7th Street and 9th Street.
Officers found two victims at the scene with gunshot wounds and had them taken to a hospital. Three other victims with gunshot wounds also showed up at St. Joseph Medical Center around the same time.
The condition of the victims is not known. Police have not confirmed if all victims are connected to the same shooting.
